pages.text: $(5)Miner's Fervor$() is a Twisted enchantment that can be applied to all tools.$(p)It causes you to break blocks very quickly, but never instantaneously.$(p)It is exclusive with $(9)Efficiency$().
Despite having a speed cap, the per-level boost is much higher than $(9)Efficiency$().$(p)This makes it an ideal choice for tools with a slow base speed.
